message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $18,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $18,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,000. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Alice, $16,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really looking to stay within my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $15,000.  Let's see if we can finalize this deal.
